name: DodgeAndBuild
description:
Dodge And Build!

Run from projectiles! design the stages in order to pass them!

This games requires speed and tactics.

Design parts of the stages in order to make them easier/passable

You only have 10 seconds to finish the level! make your movements quick and accurate!


Have good time with grandpa 

(Yeah, he is kinda weird)

Made in 1 week for the #BulletHellJam2021! Also, made with pygame, I hope you will enjoy the game :)

Thanks a lot for my friends for playtesting the game!

Also big thank you for @DaFluffyPotato and @KidsCanCode tutorials in youtube, they taught me a lot!
